column1: Local Foods////I really like Local Foods. It has such a laid-back vibe. My favorite thing on the menu is the crunchy chicken sandwich. Every now and then I'll switch it up and get it on a baguette instead of the regular pretzel roll. There are two locations - the one in Rice Village and the one in Upper Kirby. Personally
column2: I prefer the one in Upper Kirby because they have much more outdoor seating with a really cute outside area. PLUS
column3: they have the frozen version of their mintade
column4: the best drink in the entire world. Not too sweet
column6: it's the most refreshing drink of the day. I wish they would change their menu up
column7: or make it a little bigger with more options.
